How it works

Choose Water

Select the water you want e.g
bottle water

Place an order

Make an order of water
you have selected.

Vendor receives order

Wait for a vendor to receive
and process your order.

Water is delivered to you

Water is delivered to your
delivery address

We believe should be accessible to everyone
no matter where they are

By craeting a platform where water vendors can be conected to
customers we are achieving that
